alert.note: Alert for Big Horn (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 18 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: .Warm temperatures since Thursday have caused higher elevation snow melt to occurred again. Water levels in the Medicine Lodge Creek have risen since last night, as a result. This trend is expected to continue tonight into Sunday. ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Along the Medicine Lodge Creek, near the Medicine Lodge Campground. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 314 PM MDT, gauge reports indicated snowmelt. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Medicine Lodge Archeological Center. - Medicine Lodge Archeological Center is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
